info.name: NS Record Detection
author: pdteam
info.description: An NS record was detected. An NS record delegates a subdomain to a set of name servers.

request:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 49333
;; flags: rd; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 0, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 4096

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;carte-verte.beta.gouv.fr.	IN	 NS
response:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 49333
;; flags: qr rd ra; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 2, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 1232

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;carte-verte.beta.gouv.fr.	IN	 NS

;; ANSWER SECTION:
carte-verte.beta.gouv.fr.	3600	IN	NS	ns102.ovh.net.
carte-verte.beta.gouv.fr.	3600	IN	NS	dns102.ovh.net.

info.name: MX Record Detection
author: pdteam
info.description: An MX record was detected. MX records direct emails to a mail exchange server.

request:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 27111
;; flags: rd; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 0, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 4096

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;carte-verte.beta.gouv.fr.	IN	 MX
response:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 27111
;; flags: qr rd ra; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 3, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 1232

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;carte-verte.beta.gouv.fr.	IN	 MX

;; ANSWER SECTION:
carte-verte.beta.gouv.fr.	3600	IN	MX	1 mx1.mail.ovh.net.
carte-verte.beta.gouv.fr.	3600	IN	MX	100 mx3.mail.ovh.net.
carte-verte.beta.gouv.fr.	3600	IN	MX	5 mx2.mail.ovh.net.

info.name: CAA Record
author: pdteam
info.description: A CAA record was discovered. A CAA record is used to specify which certificate authorities (CAs) are allowed to issue certificates for a domain.

request:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 10584
;; flags: rd; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 0, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 4096

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;carte-verte.beta.gouv.fr.	IN	 CAA
response:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 10584
;; flags: qr rd ra; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 0, AUTHORITY: 1, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 512

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;carte-verte.beta.gouv.fr.	IN	 CAA

;; AUTHORITY SECTION:
carte-verte.beta.gouv.fr.	60	IN	SOA	dns102.ovh.net. tech.ovh.net. 2023121115 86400 3600 3600000 60

; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 1232

;; ANSWER SECTION:
carte-verte.beta.gouv.fr.	600	IN	TXT	"v=spf1 include:mx.ovh.com -all"

info.name: DNS TXT Record Detected

info.description: A DNS TXT record was detected. The TXT record lets a domain admin leave notes on a DNS server.

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:

; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 1232

;carte-verte.beta.gouv.fr.	IN	 TXT

;; ANSWER SECTION:
carte-verte.beta.gouv.fr.	600	IN	TXT	"v=spf1 include:mx.ovh.com -all"

info.name: XSS-Protection Header - Cross-Site Scripting
author: joshlarsen
info.description: Setting the XSS-Protection header is deprecated. Setting the header to anything other than `0` can actually introduce an XSS vulnerability.

request:
GET / HTTP/1.1
Host: carte-verte.beta.gouv.fr
User-Agent: Nuclei - Open-source project (github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei)
Connection: close
Accept: */*
Accept-Language: en
Accept-Encoding: gzip

info.name: Sitemap Detection
author: houdinis
info.description: A sitemap is a file where you provide information about the pages, videos, and other files on your site, and the relationships between them.

request:
GET /sitemap.xml HTTP/1.1
Host: carte-verte.beta.gouv.fr
User-Agent: Nuclei - Open-source project (github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei)
Connection: close
Accept: */*
Accept-Language: en
Accept-Encoding: gzip
response:
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Connection: close
Content-Length: 212
Accept-Ranges: bytes
Access-Control-Allow-Origin: *
Age: 1170860
Cache-Control: public, max-age=0, must-revalidate
Content-Disposition: inline; filename="sitemap.xml"
Content-Security-Policy: default-src 'none'; connect-src 'self' https://*.gouv.fr; font-src 'self'; media-src 'self'; img-src 'self' data:; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' https://stats.beta.gouv.fr; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline'; object-src 'self' data:; frame-ancestors 'self'; base-uri 'self' https://*.gouv.fr; form-action 'self' https://*.gouv.fr; block-all-mixed-content ; upgrade-insecure-requests ;
Content-Type: application/xml
Cross-Origin-Embedder-Policy: credentialless
Cross-Origin-Opener-Policy: same-origin
Cross-Origin-Resource-Policy: cross-origin
Date: Sun, 19 May 2024 01:20:13 GMT
Etag: "4a5ddd34fdf8ad4c306fe3caa906a4b9"
Permissions-Policy: fullscreen=(), display-capture=(), camera=(), microphone=(), geolocation=()
Referrer-Policy: no-referrer, strict-origin-when-cross-origin
Server: Vercel
Strict-Transport-Security: max-age=63072000
X-Content-Type-Options: nosniff
X-Frame-Options: DENY
X-Matched-Path: /sitemap.xml
X-Vercel-Cache: HIT
X-Vercel-Id: iad1::tpcvl-1716081613286-d70332af818f
X-Xss-Protection: 1; mode=block

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<sitemapindex xmlns="http://www.sitemaps.org/schemas/sitemap/0.9">
<sitemap><loc>https://carte-verte-8vb9oz5rj-ademe.vercel.app/sitemap-0.xml</loc></sitemap>
</sitemapindex>

info.name: WAF Detection
author: dwisiswant0
lu4nx
info.description: A web application firewall was detected.

request:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: carte-verte.beta.gouv.fr
User-Agent: Nuclei - Open-source project (github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei)
Connection: close
Content-Length: 27
Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded
Accept-Encoding: gzip

_=<script>alert(1)</script>
response:
HTTP/1.1 405 Method Not Allowed
Connection: close
Content-Length: 0
Age: 6653283
Cache-Control: public, max-age=0, must-revalidate
Content-Disposition: inline
Content-Security-Policy: default-src 'none'; connect-src 'self' https://*.gouv.fr; font-src 'self'; media-src 'self'; img-src 'self' data:; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' https://stats.beta.gouv.fr; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline'; object-src 'self' data:; frame-ancestors 'self'; base-uri 'self' https://*.gouv.fr; form-action 'self' https://*.gouv.fr; block-all-mixed-content ; upgrade-insecure-requests ;
Content-Type: text/html; charset=utf-8
Cross-Origin-Embedder-Policy: credentialless
Cross-Origin-Opener-Policy: same-origin
Cross-Origin-Resource-Policy: cross-origin
Date: Sun, 19 May 2024 01:20:22 GMT
Permissions-Policy: fullscreen=(), display-capture=(), camera=(), microphone=(), geolocation=()
Referrer-Policy: no-referrer, strict-origin-when-cross-origin

info.name: Detect SSL Certificate Issuer
author: lingtren
info.description: Extract the issuer's organization from the target's certificate. Issuers are entities which sign and distribute certificates.

info.name: SSL DNS Names
author: pdteam
info.description: Extract the Subject Alternative Name (SAN) from the target's certificate. SAN facilitates the usage of additional hostnames with the same certificate.

info.name: TLS Version - Detect
author: pdteam
pussycat0x
info.description:
TLS version detection is a security process used to determine the version of the Transport Layer Security (TLS) protocol used by a computer or server.
It is important to detect the TLS version in order to ensure secure communication between two computers or servers.
